name: get_ohlc_history
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool ohlc_history_forex.
Tool description: Api to fetch forex Open High Low Close prices for a variety of currency pairs 
API description: Fetches the OHLC (Open, High, Low, Close) history data for a specified currency pair.

symbol.description: The currency pair symbol for which to retrieve OHLC history.
